main.title: Fabien Cellard
main.subtitle: I'm a junior game developer. I love making games and creating new experiences.

about.description: Hi! I'm a french developer from **Lyon**. I'm currently working at Eden Games as a gameplay programmer. My main specialties are gameplay programming, game-oriented network programming and web development. I have a masters degree in Computer Science with the video games specialization from **UQAC** (Chicoutmi QC, Canada)  and an engineer's degree in Computer Science from **Polytech Lyon** (Lyon, France).

projects.title: Gear.Club Stradale

projects.subtitle: Worked on the challenge system during my intership at Eden Games.

education.degree: Computer Science Master - Video Games specialization

works.title: Gameplay Programmer
works.description: Worked on F1 Mobile Racing as a Programmer, Gear.Club:Stradale for Apple Arcade as a Technical Referent and other in-house projects.

works.title: Intern Gameplay Programmer
works.description: Worked on mobile racing games. Had to design a camera system to spectate a race live or from a replay. I also made an objective system to support things such as missions and achievements with some server side code.

works.title: Intern Fullstack Developper
works.description: During my internship I worked on the maintenance of Travelys' website. I also worked on different internal projects and Promovol's first website.
